DOC.brief_summary: This study examine one follow method : pupillometry , spectral analysis heart rate variability metaiodobenzylguanidine scintigraphy , capable detect early diabetic autonomic neuropathy patient type 1 diabetes mellitus
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Between Pupillometry , Heart Rate Variability Metaiodobenzylguanidine Scintigraphy Diagnosis Early Diabetic Autonomic Neuropathy Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 1 diabetes mellitus Type 2 diabetes mellitus Severe cardiac autonomic neuropathy Medications insulin Ocular disease refractive eye disorder History neurologic disease History cardiovascular disease Thyroid disease Vitamin B insufficiency Other possible cause autonomic failure
